lg.l: O Ihesu dulcedo cordium. Pater noster. Aue maria.
O Ihesu of mannys hert and mannys mynde.
Art the very perfide floured swetnes.
Thou suffrest and tastyth for manne kynde.
Of galle and eyesselle the foule bytternesse.
O ihesu able me in fulle clennesse
Receyue the flesche and blode at my laste ende.
Remedye to my sowle defence ayenst the fende.
O Ihesu regalis. Pater noster. Aue maria.
O Ihesu. O. kyng comen of kyng kynde.
O maydens son of most uertuous lyuyng.
What anguyssh what sorow in thy mynde.
Thou hadest of the Iewes cruelle seying.
In dispite and scorne they called the her kyng
And so thou were kyng bothe of byrthe and kynde.
Anderstonen this nought these iewes bethe blynde.

div.lg: Ascende vp the onto godhede The voyse of thi manhoude fulfelled with penaunce. Ofader why hast thou lefte me in drede Of this harde dethe and this grete greuaunse. The whiche I suffered for mannys mysgouyrnaunce O swte ihesu with rede blody syde. Unto thi ryche regyon be thou me gyde.

body.div:
O Ihesu alpha et oo. Pater noster. Aue maria.
O ihesu begynnere of alle endesse And cause of the ioye that man is ynne. And ender of euery parfyte besynes. Graunt me outh of my sowle to voyde synne. That I maye that hye place aske and wynne Of the that bare the wondes so wyde. And sittest in heuen on thi faders ryght syde.
